languages.text: "Наши пути, элантах, были полны душевных терзаний и бесчисленных лишений. И потому тьма впереди не страшит мое закаленное сердце. И потому же она не страшит тебя".
"Our travels were full of heartache and countless hardships, elantach. And so the darkness ahead does not frighten my weathered heart. Nor does it frighten you."
languages.original_text: "Наши пути, элантах, были полны душевных терзаний и бесчисленных лишений. И потому тьма впереди не страшит мое закаленное сердце. И потому же она не страшит тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Our travels were full of heartache and countless hardships, elantach. And so the darkness ahead does not frighten my tempered heart. Neither does it frighten you."
"Our travels were full of heartache and countless hardships, elantach. And so the darkness ahead does not frighten my tempered heart. Neither does it frighten you."
"Our travels were full of heartache and countless hardships, elantach. And so the darkness ahead does not frighten my weathered heart. Nor does it frighten you."
"Our travels were full of heartache and countless hardships, elantach. And so the darkness ahead does not frighten my weathered heart. Nor does it frighten you."
"Our travels were full of heartache and countless hardships, elantach. And so the darkness ahead does not frighten my weathered heart. Nor does it frighten you."

languages.text: “我们一路而来，跨越了无数痛苦与艰险，外界人。因此，前方的黑暗不会吓到我饱经风霜的心，也一样吓不到你。”
languages.original_text: "Our travels were full of heartache and countless hardships, elantach. And so the darkness ahead does not frighten my weathered heart. Nor does it frighten you."

traits.locale_text: “我们一路而来，跨越了无数痛苦与艰险，外界人。因此，前方的黑暗不会吓到我饱经风霜的心，也一样吓不到你。”

languages.text: «Nuestros viajes han estado cargados de pesar e innumerables dificultades, elantach. Por tanto, la oscuridad que nos espera no despierta ningún temor en mi corazón curtido. Ni en el tuyo tampoco».
languages.original_text: "Our travels were full of heartache and countless hardships, elantach. And so the darkness ahead does not frighten my weathered heart. Nor does it frighten you."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestros viajes han estado cargados de pesar e innumerables dificultades, elantach. Por tanto, la oscuridad que nos espera no despierta ningún temor en mi corazón curtido. Ni en el tuyo tampoco».

languages.text: 「エランタよ、お前との旅は心の痛みと数え切れないほどの苦難で溢れんばかりだった。だからこそ、前途にある暗闇に怯えることはしない。お前も恐れてはいないのだろう」
languages.original_text: "Our travels were full of heartache and countless hardships, elantach. And so the darkness ahead does not frighten my weathered heart. Nor does it frighten you."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタよ、お前との旅は心の痛みと数え切れないほどの苦難で溢れんばかりだった。だからこそ、前途にある暗闇に怯えることはしない。お前も恐れてはいないのだろう」

languages.text: "Unsere Reisen waren voller Herzschmerz und unzähligen Mühen, Elantach. Die Dunkelheit, die vor uns liegt, kann mein verwittertes Herz daher nicht ängstigen. Und sie ängstigt auch Euch nicht."
languages.original_text: "Our travels were full of heartache and countless hardships, elantach. And so the darkness ahead does not frighten my weathered heart. Nor does it frighten you."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Reisen waren voller Herzschmerz und unzähligen Mühen, Elantach. Die Dunkelheit, die vor uns liegt, kann mein verwittertes Herz daher nicht ängstigen. Und sie ängstigt auch Euch nicht."

languages.text: « Nos aventures ont été pavées d'embûches et de chagrins, elantach. Aussi, les ténèbres qui nous attendent ne sauraient effrayer mon cœur aguerri, pas plus qu'elles ne vous effraient, vous. »
languages.original_text: "Our travels were full of heartache and countless hardships, elantach. And so the darkness ahead does not frighten my weathered heart. Nor does it frighten you."

traits.locale_text: « Nos aventures ont été pavées d'embûches et de chagrins, elantach. Aussi, les ténèbres qui nous attendent ne sauraient effrayer mon cœur aguerri, pas plus qu'elles ne vous effraient, vous. »

languages.text: "Yolculuklarımız, kalp kırıklıkları ve sayısız zorluklar doluydu elantach. Bu yüzden de önümüzdeki karanlık, aşınmış kalbimi korkutamıyor. Seninkini korkutamadığını da biliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Our travels were full of heartache and countless hardships, elantach. And so the darkness ahead does not frighten my weathered heart. Nor does it frighten you."
